author: author
character-feedback: left a feedback for your character

all-rights-reserved-text: the author retains exclusive rights to their work, and no one else can use, reproduce, or modify it without the author's permission.
creative-commons-text: allows authors to give others permission to use their work in specific ways, with varying levels of restrictions depending on the specific license.
public-domain-text: your work is not protected by copyright and can be used freely by anyone without permission.
copyleft-text: allows others to use, reproduce, or modify a work, as long as any derivative works are also licensed under the same license.
verify-text: Only users with verified email can post comments
cookies: To comply with privacy laws, we require your consent for the use of cookies on our website, which are small data files that personalize content, improve website performance, and remember preferences, and by clicking 'Accept' on the cookie banner, you agree to the use of all cookies, but if you prefer not to allow cookies, you can disable them in your browser settings, noting that it may affect your user experience.
